duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide leadership over a diverse team of technical and programmatic professionals in support of cybersecurity objectives.

Work closely with customers, cross-functional teams, and project managers to develop and mature the scope, deliverables, required resources, budget, and plans of actions and milestones (POAM) for new and existing initiatives.
Manage project teams to ensure effective execution of assigned cyber initiatives.
Analyze, evaluate, and overcome program risks, and produce program reports to support periodic program reviews within the organization and with customers.
Develop working-level and leadership-level briefing materials as required.

education_certification.credential: Active DoD Secret Clearance and ability to sustain one
DoD 8570 IAM / IAT Lvl I certification
